description technical detail:
Lenovo ThinkVision LT2013s -19.5" Widescreen LCD Monitor
The ThinkVision LT2013s is a light and slim monitor that comfortably manages your workspace. Equipped with LED panel, tilt stand, VGA connectivity, this monitor delivers a reliable performance at an affordable price.
